edits.oldString:
About Post-Exertional Malaise (PEM)

PEM is the worsening of symptoms following physical or mental activity that was previously tolerated. It's a key feature of ME/CFS and often occurs in Long COVID. Symptoms may be delayed and can last days to weeks.
